timeline.body: I don't think we need this you can use `BatchMode#valueOf` method instead

timeline.bodyHTML:
if we get rid of nameIndex you can change it into:

Suggested change
BatchMode lookedUpBatchMode = nameIndex.get(batchMode.toString().toUpperCase());
BatchMode lookedUpBatchMode = BatchMode.valueOf(batchMode.toString().toUpperCase());
timeline.author: conker84

replies.bodyText: And we can also get rid of the following exception
